com.nimsoft.nimbus
Class NimException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InvalidMessageException, NimStatusCodeException
public class NimException
extends Exception

Nimsoft Exception class. Instead of typed NimException subclasses, NimException uses an integer code to represent the particular kind of error that was encountered. Client code that needs to know the cause of the error should use the getCode() method to get the error type associated with the exception.

See Also:

public NimException()
Create an empty NimException (no error message or code).

NimException

public NimException(int code)
Create a NimException with the specified error code and no error message.

Parameters:
code - the error code (one of the NimException.E_* constants)

                    String text)
Create a NimException with the specified error code and message text.

Parameters:
code - the error code (one of the NimException.E_* constants)
text - the error message text

NimException

public NimException(int code,
                    Throwable th)
Create a NimException with the specified error code and throwable cause.

Parameters:
code - the error code (one of the NimException.E_* constants)
th - the throwable that caused the error

NimException

public NimException(int code,
                    String text,
                    Throwable th)
Create a NimException with the specified error code, message text, and the throwable that caused the error.

Parameters:
code - the error code (one of the NimException.E_* constants)
text - the error message text
th - the throwable that caused the error
